Leaflet BlurredLocationDisplay | by Public Lab

This page shows how different zoom levels and different precisons corresponds to different Human Readable blurring .

1.) At zoom level = 3 :
Coordinate : [23.1 , 77.1]

Human Readable placename : Country
2.) At zoom level = 4 :
Coordinate : [23.1111 , 77.1111]

Human Readable placename : country , state
3.) At zoom level = 5 :
[23.1111 , 77.1111]

Human Readable placename :country , state , province

4.) At zoom level = 6 :
Coordinate : [23.11111111 , 77.11111111]

Human Readable placename : country , state , province , region
5.) At zoom level = 11 :
Coordinate : [23.11111111 , 77.11111111]

Human Readable placename : neighbourhood
6.) At zoom level = 13 :
[23.11111111 , 77.11111111]

Human Readable placename : Exact Block
